sentences.en: At that time, taxes and levies were as many as the hairs on an ox.
sentences.cn: 那时, 苛捐杂税多如牛毛.

sentences.en: Fierce - browed , I coolly defy a thousand pointing fingers ; headbowed , like a willing ox I serve the children.
sentences.cn: 横眉冷对千夫指, 俯首甘为孺子牛.

sentences.en: From that day on, the farmer would not flagellate his ox anymore.
sentences.cn: 从那天起，农夫再也不鞭打牛了。

sentences.en: He is as strong as an ox.
If the ox falls , whet your knife.
Iron - ox is another name for tractor.
Seize a horse by the mane, and lead an ox by the nose.
She is one year younger than I am; she was born in the year of the ox.
sentences.cn: 她比我小一岁, 是属牛的.

sentences.en: Taking a glance at the stone, you will see that it is just like a crouched ox.
sentences.cn: 蓦然看去,这石头像一头卧牛.

sentences.en: The ox is never woe , till he to the harrow go.
We all call him Iron Ox.
We must lead an ox by the halter.

sentences.cn: 火生得很旺,足以烤一头牛了.

sentences.en: You cannot flay the same ox twice.
